tool_description: Creates a new work item, such as a task, issue, or enhancement, and adds it to the project.

arguments.name: work_item_type
arguments.description: The type of work item to create (e.g., task, issue, enhancement)

arguments.name: title
arguments.description: The title or name of the work item

arguments.name: description
arguments.description: A detailed description of the work item
arguments.example: This task involves implementing Feature X with specific requirements.

arguments.name: assignee
arguments.description: The team member to whom the work item is assigned

arguments.name: priority
arguments.description: Specifies the priority level of the work item

arguments.name: due_date
arguments.description: Sets a due date for the work item

arguments.name: tags
arguments.description: Allows adding tags or labels for categorization

tool_description: Updates the status of a work item to reflect its progress in the development lifecycle.

arguments.name: work_item_id
arguments.description: The ID of the work item to update

arguments.name: new_status
arguments.description: The new status to assign to the work item (e.g., In Progress, Done)

arguments.name: new_assignee
arguments.description: Specifies a new assignee for the work item

arguments.name: estimated_effort
arguments.description: Indicates the estimated effort required to complete the work item (Story points)

arguments.name: dependencies
arguments.description: Lists any dependencies or related work items

tool_description: Provides feedback and comments on code reviews, highlighting areas for improvement.

arguments.name: review_id
arguments.description: The ID of the code review to provide feedback on

arguments.name: feedback
arguments.description: Detailed feedback and comments for the code review
arguments.example: Consider optimizing this function for better performance.

arguments.name: code_version
arguments.description: Identifies the specific version of the code under review

arguments.name: severity
arguments.description: Assigns a severity level to the feedback (e.g., critical, major, minor)

tool_description: Generates a report summarizing test case execution results, including pass/fail status and issues found.

arguments.name: test_suite_id
arguments.description: The ID of the test suite for which to generate the execution report

arguments.name: test_environment
arguments.description: Specifies the testing environment used for the test cases

arguments.name: pass_fail_status
arguments.description: Indicates whether each test case passed or failed

arguments.name: test_case_types
arguments.description: Specifies the type of test cases included in the report

tool_description: Creates a new project and sets up the initial project configuration.

arguments.name: project_name
arguments.description: The name or title of the new project

arguments.name: project_description
arguments.description: A brief description of the project's objectives and scope
arguments.example: Development of a new e-commerce platform.

arguments.name: project_lead
arguments.description: The team member who will lead the project

arguments.name: start_date
arguments.description: Sets a start date for the project

arguments.name: project_team
arguments.description: Lists the initial team members involved in the project

arguments.name: target_date
arguments.description: Sets a target date for project completion

tool_description: Creates a new sprint within a project and defines its duration and goals.

arguments.name: project_id
arguments.description: The ID of the project in which to create the sprint

arguments.name: sprint_name
arguments.description: The name or title of the new sprint

arguments.name: sprint_duration
arguments.description: The duration of the sprint (e.g., 2 weeks)

arguments.name: sprint_goals
arguments.description: Defines specific goals and objectives for the sprint (e.g., deliverables)

arguments.name: sprint_capacity
arguments.description: Sets the maximum capacity or workload for the sprint(Story Points)

arguments.name: backlog_items
arguments.description: Specifies the backlog items to be included in the sprint

tool_description: Automates repetitive workflow tasks by defining triggers and actions.

arguments.name: trigger_event
arguments.description: The event or condition that triggers the workflow

arguments.name: workflow_actions
arguments.description: The actions to be executed when the trigger event occurs

arguments.name: notifications
arguments.description: Specifies who should receive notifications when the workflow is triggered

arguments.name: actions_log
arguments.description: Keeps a log of actions performed by the workflow for auditing

tool_description: Assigns a work item to a specific team member or group.

arguments.name: work_item_id
arguments.description: The ID of the work item to be assigned

arguments.name: assignee
arguments.description: The team member or group to whom the work item is assigned

arguments.name: due_date
arguments.description: Sets a due date for the assigned work item

arguments.name: work_item_type
arguments.description: Indicates the type of work item being assigned
